title: CUDA error: device-side assert triggered
body:
**CUDA error: device-side assert triggered**


 - OS:Ubuntu 18.04
 - pytorch 1.2
 - python 3.7

I am using custom data to train the network.
I have followed the tutorial mentioned [Training Custom Data](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data)
In addition to that I am using [single class](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Example:-Train-Single-Class)
My repository is also up-to-date.
I have also checked sample train_batch0.jpg which looked fine to me.
Any help would be appriciated. 
Thank you

<3:49:19,  2.47it/s]/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1565272271120/work/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/IndexKernel.cu:60: lambda [](int)->auto::operator()(int)->auto: block: [0,0,0], thread: [32,0,0] Assertion `index >= -sizes[i] && index < sizes[i] && "index out of bounds"` failed.
